nodes.bodyText: Maybe extract to a util method? The same destroy logic appears four times in this class.
Well, it's just a very simple iteration and  the util method would have to accept three params. But you're probably right ;-)
Nice, I didn't even know we actually have Annotated impls just for InjectionPoint :)
Yeah, it's ugly I know but we need to support some old stuff ;-)
Should we also test injection of transient reference bean into observer method?
That's a good point. In fact, we don't support them ATM ;-). I'll do that.
Wait a minute, for observers the injected dependent beans are destroyed even without @TransientReference...
Hah, a morning intelligence test (in which I apparently failed) :-D
